CIDRMask####azurerm_virtual_hub_connecti: If azurerm_virtual_hub_connection.a.internet_security_enabled is of certain value, Then azurerm_virtual_hub_connection.a.routing.static_vnet_route.address_prefixes has certain CIDR mask length restrictions
Constant####azurerm_virtual_hub_connecti: If azurerm_virtual_hub_connection.a.routing is not null nor empty, Then azurerm_virtual_hub_connection.a.internet_security_enabled == false
